attributes.action: Scrap all cycle lanes, and restore the roads to their pre-cycle lane widths
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since almost all cycle lanes carry hardly any cycles, even in the rush hour, they contribute greatly to congestion and slow the traffic considerably. Scrap them, and restore full width roads, to be used by the people who pay for them i.e. the motorised driver.
